txt.en: This blue token that you found upon a Khundolar sorcerer bears writing that you cannot comprehend. Perhaps someone at Etheburg, the way-post of the Rohirrim border-guard in the Brown Lands, may know something of it.

'Hail, [placeholder]! What have you there? This medallion is of Easterling make, to be sure, but I am not sure what it portends.\n\n'You say that you found this upon one of their sorcerers? Most likely, then, it is a sign of their order....'
This token you found seems to signify some sort of order among the sorcerers of the Khundolar.
Bring the strange medallion to one of the Rohirrim border-guard at Etheburg in the Brown Lands
Rohirrim may be found at Etheburg in the Brown Lands.\n\nYou should bring the strange medallion to one of the Rohirrim border-guard.
